About

25 years providing testing and quality assurance services.

I provide testing and quality assurances services, and have experience in a wide selection of industries. I wear transparency on my sleeve, and while detailed and thorough in testing, I focus on the subsequent help and guidance. This approach evolved from contract work at over 55 companies, from seed start-ups to global corporations, in both testing and management capacities.

I have worked with hundreds of developers, and long-learnt the importance of a synergy between development and testing. Or testing risks becoming an isolated project that struggles to keep up with the design and development cycles. Commonly in contract I am THE Quality person, and as such very adept at communicating on different levels. Whether guiding Business Analsyts in writing Gherkin, or discussing with DevOps about testing in CI pipeline.

A terminal geek, I am always seeking out new automation frameworks in opensource world and new ways of testing. Opensource can be a bewildering world, especailly now that marketing-speak has heavily entered that world. I have over 20 years experience, fingers burnt more than once, and my approach automation is to start lean, then build on that.

I am adept at introducing quality measures into projects, at ALL stages of development. I have been on some rollercoaster project rides, and you can benefit from that experience. Whilst I am creative with my approach, I am strongly rooted in reality - a safe "port in a storm".

while we will never achieve 100% quality, there is no harm in aspiring to it - this naturally drives continuous improvement.

Key skills

  • Quality Engineering from Design to Production.
  • Test Engineering in CI/CD pipelines.
  • Performance testing to ensure apps are both secure and stable./li>
  • Test Architecture/Frameworks
  • Tester Coaching
  • Accessibility reviews and automation
